review:
Doctor is professional and friendly, makes you understand all the treatment well in hand. I surely recommend the Dr Aruna, and Dr chethan for all the dental problems.
I visited for dental tooth pain at pranam dental care, Dr aruna explanined the treament plan well in advance and did my root canal treatment, ther was no pain, doctor as good knowledge about the treatment.
For another teeth dental implant was done and tooth zirconia cap was placed.
I am happy with treatment.
I will surely recomemd Dr Aruna to my family and friends.

******* **** ***** they are very helpful and all they care about is your treatment, they make sure to dnt end up with any more injuries in future , they do take care that you take all preventive measures. But I must add treatments are pretty expensive. And to me rest seems perfect.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very friendly with the child and dealt with patience. Satisfied with the treatment of my child.

Nice, soft spoken, explained treatment Plan nicely,
Made me comfortable during the whole treatment.I am happy with the treatment plan, treatment and the behaviour of Doctor Aruna.
